document.full_text: japan's prime minister was headed on saturday to the disaster zone where workers are braving radiation from a crippled nuclear plant to battle the world's worst atomic crisis since chernobyl.
document.title: japan pm to visit nuclear disaster zone
lines_and_colors: japan's prime minister was headed on saturday to the disaster zone where workers are braving radiation from a crippled nuclear plant to battle the world's worst atomic crisis since chernobyl.
